SWIFTER-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from swifter.01-j)

example.name: lexical comparative: swifter
example.text: The privatization of the state - owned economy is the most important channel for the formation and expansion of interest groups . Because redistributing wealth , especially stealing wealth , is much quicker and swifter than creating wealth .
